constants.name: species_identifier
constants.header:
Translation table for species_reference_identifier_definition. Implemented in: - utilities.xsd: complexType species_reference
\version "$Id: species_reference_identifier.xml 679 2015-03-24 13:14:59Z tjohnson $" URL: https://gforge.efda-itm.eu/svn/itmshared/trunk/src/itm_constants

int.name: ion
int.description: Ion species in a single/average state; refer to ion-structure

int.name: ion_state
int.description: Ion species in a particular state; refer to ion/state-structure

int.name: neutral
int.description: Neutral species in a single/average state; refer to neutral-structure

int.name: neutral_state
int.description: Neutral species in a particular state; refer to neutral/state-structure
